K06D0026_H0027:261a-1: a'arya pra dzny'a pa ra mi t'a s'urya garbha mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K06D0026_H0027:261a-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K06D0026_H0027:261a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06D0026_H0027:261a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K06D0026_H0027:261a-7: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha na chos kyi
K06D0026_H0027:261a-8: dgon pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu
K06D0026_H0027:261a-9: mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
K06D0026_H0027:261a-10: kyi zhing mtha' yas pa nas 'dus pa tshad med
K06D0026_H0027:261a-11: grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K06D0026_H0027:261a-12: de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma
K06D0026_H0027:261a-13: rab tu snang pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa de
K06D0026_H0027:261a-14: stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
K06D0026_H0027:261a-15: der song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
K06D0026_H0027:261b-0: bdag de bzhin @261b gshegs pa la zhu ba mchis te /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-1: bcom ldan 'das gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-3: ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:261b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu
K06D0026_H0027:261b-5: snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K06D0026_H0027:261b-7: thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar shes
K06D0026_H0027:261b-8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
K06D0026_H0027:261b-9: bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06D0026_H0027:261b-11: thabs mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma zhes bya ba yod pas /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-12: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:261b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-17: 'di ltar thabs mkhas pa'i nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-21: 'di ltar nyi mas myu gu smin par byed pa ltar /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma lta
K06D0026_H0027:261b-23: bus sems can rnams la byang chub kyi myu gu
K06D0026_H0027:261b-26: nyi ma la dbri bkol med pa ltar /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thugs rje ni /
K06D0026_H0027:261b-28: sems can thams cad la snyoms par mdzad do //
K06D0026_H0027:261b-30: nyi mas nyal nyil sreg pa ltar /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong gi shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa'i nyal nyil rnams sreg @262a *//
K06D0026_H0027:262a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyen po ye
K06D0026_H0027:262a-5: shes dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa 'khyags pa 'ju
K06D0026_H0027:262a-8: nyi mas mun pa sel ba ltar /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i
K06D0026_H0027:262a-10: ye shes kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mun pa
K06D0026_H0027:262a-12: drug pa ni; nyi mas gling bzhi 'khor ba ltar /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pas
K06D0026_H0027:262a-14: sdug bsngal gyi chu bo bzhi las thar par mdzad
K06D0026_H0027:262a-16: nyi mas kun la snyoms par dro ba bzhin du
K06D0026_H0027:262a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas
K06D0026_H0027:262a-18: sems can thams cad la rab tu dga' bar mdzad
K06D0026_H0027:262a-19: pa'i thabs ni / dro ba'i las lta bu'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-22: des 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-24: mtshan ma thams cad dang rab tu bral ba dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-26: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-27: gang zag pa med pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-28: gang zag pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262a-29: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262a-35: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-0: gzhan @262b ma yin pa de nyid dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-2: de kho na'i don la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K06D0026_H0027:262b-4: nyi ma rab tu snang ba la 'di skad ces
K06D0026_H0027:262b-5: bka' stsal to // rigs kyi bu /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-6: byang chub sems dpas yang chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-7: skye ba med pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-9: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-10: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-11: ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes par bya'o //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-12: rigs kyi bu; gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'dzin par byed na /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-13: de las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-14: de bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-15: shes rab kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-16: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-17: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:262b-18: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-20: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab
K06D0026_H0027:262b-21: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o
K06D0026_H0027:262b-22: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-23: mang thos dam pa'i chos la brtson //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-24: sems can kun la byams par ldan //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-25: brtson 'grus go cha phun sum tshogs //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-26: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mos //
K06D0026_H0027:262b-27: bsam gtan ting 'dzin sgom la brtson //
K06D0026_H0027:263a-2: yang dag theg pa'i lam du zhugs //
K06D0026_H0027:263a-3: sngon gyi rgyal sras de ltar spyod //
K06D0026_H0027:263a-4: mkhas pas ma nor de bzhin slobs //
K06D0026_H0027:263a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06D0026_H0027:263a-6: byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang /
K06D0026_H0027:263a-7: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K06D0026_H0027:263a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06D0026_H0027:263a-9: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
